scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts God, identifiable by his halo and flowing white beard and hair, gesturing with his right hand towards the water and land. He is dressed in a pink robe and stands barefoot on a rocky, green terrain. Around him, various birds are shown in flight and perched on a tree and the ground. The background is a blue expanse filled with wavy lines representing water, interspersed with golden star-like motifs and cloud formations. Fish are visible in the water at the bottom of the image. This scene illustrates the biblical account of God's creation of birds and fish on the fifth day.
